titles.title: Media coverage of nonsmoker only hiring policies

descriptions.description: This SPSS dataset contains 1,159 records (from 1995-2013) representing the content of media items published in the US concerning employers who chose to hire only nonsmokers. The Excel spreadsheet contains a list of the titles, authors, publication sources, and publication dates of all the media items in the SPSS database.
There are 71 variables in the SPSS dataset that cover the characteristics of each media item, as well as the content.
